donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: USAID funds to provide support to strengthen civil society by establishing community microfinance institutions which allow local decision-making, increase community participation in the issue that aftect their lives, and empower people to address independently househod and community needs.  The total project 00072865 project contribution is US$900,000.
